meanings.definition: A person who cleans and maintains the appearance of vehicles.
meanings.sent1: The detailers at the car wash did a great job cleaning my car.
meanings.sent2: I hired detailers to make my old car look shiny and new again.
meanings.sent3: The detailers joked that they could probably find a whole meal under the car seats.
meanings.sent4: Watching the detailers work was like witnessing artists creating a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The detailers' attention to every little spot on the car was impressive.

meanings.definition: A company or business that specializes in cleaning and maintaining the appearance of vehicles.
meanings.sent1: My friend's detailers business is always busy with customers wanting their cars cleaned.
meanings.sent2: I called the detailers to schedule an appointment for my car detailing.
meanings.sent3: The detailers' van was so full of cleaning supplies, it looked like a mobile cleaning store.
meanings.sent4: The detailers' shop was a beacon of cleanliness in the midst of the busy street.
meanings.sent5: The detailers' logo was a symbol of trust and quality service.
